source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: Microsoft Word & Excel 2016/365 Productivity Tips
items.headline: How to make your workday more productive
objectives_summary: Increase their productivity by utilising MUST know tricks and shortcuts
Recognise how these shortcuts can save time and reduce risk and stress
How to leverage Microsoft Excel and Word to get more done in less time!

items.title: Microsoft Excel - Advanced Formulas And Functions
items.headline: Advanced Microsoft Excel Formulas And Functions - Take Your Excel Skills To The Next Level
objectives_summary: Take Your Excel Skills To The Next Level

items.title: Advanced Microsoft Access 2013 Training Video
items.headline: Take your Microsoft Access skills to the next level with this Advanced Access Course from Infinite Skills
objectives_summary: Take your Microsoft Access 2013 skills to the next level

items.title: Introduction to Microsoft Excel 2013
items.headline: Learn the basics of using Microsoft Excel 2013
objectives_summary: Learning the Excel 2013 interface
Working with worksheets
Using templates

items.title: Excel VBA Essentials for Reporting Automation
items.headline: Use Excel & Access with Excel VBA macros & SQL to automate any Excel report, and become a master at Data Analytics!
objectives_summary: Learn how to automate recurrent tasks with Excel VBA
Learn how to create and structure a Microsoft Access database, and how to interact with it by using SQL
Learn how to automate data transfer between Excel and Access by using VBA and SQL

items.title: Microsoft Power BI Intermediate
items.headline: Take your data modelling skills to another level and learn how to use SQL, DAX with Power BI to drive change
objectives_summary: Create SQL SELECT queries to extract data from databases.
Learn to use the power of the database to achieve high performance queries.
Write DAX calculations to generate powerful insights on data

items.title: Power BI  for beginners
items.headline: Perform Business analysis| Connect to various Data Sources|Transform Data |Publish Data
objectives_summary: How to sign up to Power BI Service
How to install Power BI Desktop
Building blocks of Power BI

items.title: Excel Power Query Crash Course
items.headline: 12 short lessons that review the basics of Excel's newest data clean-up tool: Power Query
objectives_summary: Excel Power Query is a fairly new tool useful for redundant data clean-up tasks

items.title: Microsoft Publisher 2016 Made Easy Training Tutorial
items.headline: Learn Publisher the Easy Way
objectives_summary: Create Publications
Add, Delete, Modify, and Format Text
Add, Delete, and Format Objects

items.title: Excel Power Query Training - Beginners to Advanced level

visible_instructors.job_title: Best seller instructor for Power BI and Power Excel
visible_instructors.name: Abhay
visible_instructors.title: Abhay Gadiya

items.headline: Data modelling using get & transform for business intelligence and data analytics in Excel 2010 -2016 using Power Query
objectives_summary: At the end of this Power Query Training you would understand 80% of features available in Power Query
You would be able to perform various complex data cleansing activities using Power Query
You would be able to automate various task which would have taken long hours of work.

items.title: Excel for Accountants: Volume 2
items.headline: Learn how to build formula-based reports and more.
objectives_summary: Recall at least three keyboard shortcuts and the arguments of at least three functions
Identify which Excel function can be used to perform a multicolumn list comparison
Recognize which Excel function can return the last day of the month

items.title: Master Microsoft Word 2010 the Easy Way
items.headline: Learn how to use Microsoft Word 2010 effectively.
objectives_summary: Learn the workspace and overview of the features in Word 2010.
Learn how to format text and layouts to format your entire document.
Discover how to insert tables and use them to best effect.

items.title: MS Access for Absolute Beginners
items.headline: MS Access for Absolute Beginners
objectives_summary: Build MS Access Tables
Extract Data from Tables
Build New Tables, Update Tables, Merge Tables, and other Database skills

items.title: Master Excel 2019 PC/Mac with Beginner to Advanced Courses
items.headline: Finally master spreadsheets on PC or Mac with Excel, Beginners - Advanced 3 course 2019/365 bundle
objectives_summary: Now includes Excel for Mac 2019 Beginner
Discover new and improved features in Excel 2019
Learn to master data analysis tools like Pivot tables, Slicers, Sparklines and Data Bars in Excel

items.title: Microsoft Access 2016 for Beginners: Master the Essentials
items.headline: Fast, easy way to learn this important database application inside and out
objectives_summary: Practice what you learned with included exercise files
Sorting information and running queries
Creating tables and relationships

items.title: Complete Formulas & Functions Masterclass in MS Excel [2021]
items.headline: Build an extraordinary skillset in Microsoft Excel as a true power user. The direct shortcut to career success.
objectives_summary: Build a solid understanding of ESSENTIAL Microsoft Excel functions
Learn to operate with IF logical statements, TEXT functions, TIME & DATE functions, and LOOKUP functions
Create your own simple and COMPLEX "master-level" formulas
